name: Custom Category Template
author: Bainternet

sections.description:
Simple lightweight plugin that lets you select a specific template for a category each, just like page template

any feedback or suggestions are welcome.

check out my other plugins
sections.installation:
Simple steps:

  1. Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
  3. Done!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Simple steps:

  1. Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
  3. Done!

What are the requirements?

PHP 5.2 and up.

I have Found a Bug, Now what?

Simply use the Support Forum and thanks a head for doing that.
sections.changelog:
0.4 Fixed Saving and switching back to default issue.

0.3 added template selection to add new category screen, plugin row links.

0.2 fixed class name bug which caused a fatal error.

0.1 initial release.
